```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)

lobster_data <- read_csv(("lobster_abundance_sbc_lter.csv"),
                         na = "-99999") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  uncount(count)

lobster_count <- lobster_data %>% 
  group_by(site) %>% 
  summarize(
    lobster_count = count(site)
  )
  

```
